Chili's Restaurants In Durham, North Carolina

Locations› US› North Carolina› Durham

Durham, North Carolina, is known as the home of Duke University, but this thriving North Carolina city has so much more to offer. You're bound to work up an appetite as you explore Durham, so you should know where to go to get some of the best food around. Find the closest Chili's and head on in for a fantastic meal.

Where to Find Chili's in Durham

There are several Chili's locations throughout the Durham area, including restaurants both in the city itself and in the surrounding area. The two Chili's in Durham are on Chapel Hill Road and on Fayetteville Road. If you find yourself in Raleigh, Wake Forest, Morrisville, Apex, or Holly Springs, you'll still be close to mouth-watering Tex-Mex fare. After you discover which location is most convenient for you, use the Chili's app to explore the menu, order food, or put your name on the waiting list.

Menu Offerings You'll Love

Since Chili's began in 1975, it has welcomed guests with a relaxed atmosphere and crave-worthy food. Indulge in a juicy burger or some Loaded Fajitas. Discover why our Mex Bowls are so popular. Pair your meal with a refreshing drink, such as a margarita or a fizzy soda. Delight your taste buds with some Triple Berry Crumble Cake for dessert.

What are you waiting for? Find the Chili's that is closest to you!
